subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
The aim of this project is to provide substantive support to the SFDA, to formulate its strategy and business plan; as well as develop the required institutional capacity to discharge its mandate and ultimately meet the national development plan’s aspiration for safe food and drugs management. The expected outputs of this project are:
1) Institutional capacity building 
2) Individual capacities development for an efficient national team
3) Fully integrating WTO benefits and requirements into the food and drug sector of the economy
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Support to Saudi Food and Drug
